languages.text: [Схватить пистолет охраны и выстрелить] "Стоило прикончить вас еще в первую встречу".

traits.locale_text: [Схватить пистолет охраны и выстрелить] "Стоило прикончить вас еще в первую встречу".

languages.text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

languages.text: ［床にあるピストルを拾って、カシアを撃つ］「会った時、すぐにでも殺すべきだった」
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: ［床にあるピストルを拾って、カシアを撃つ］「会った時、すぐにでも殺すべきだった」

languages.text: [抓起地上的手枪，向卡西娅射击]“我当初见到你的时候，就该杀了你才对。”
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: [抓起地上的手枪，向卡西娅射击]“我当初见到你的时候，就该杀了你才对。”

languages.text: [Coger una pistola del suelo y disparar a Cassia] «Debería haberte matado en cuanto te conocí».
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: [Coger una pistola del suelo y disparar a Cassia] «Debería haberte matado en cuanto te conocí».

languages.text: [Eine Pistole vom Boden aufheben und Cassia erschießen] "Ich hätte Euch töten sollen, als ich Euch das erste Mal begegnet bin."
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: [Eine Pistole vom Boden aufheben und Cassia erschießen] "Ich hätte Euch töten sollen, als ich Euch das erste Mal begegnet bin."

languages.text: [Ramasser une arme au sol et tirer sur Cassia] « J'aurais dû vous tuer dès le jour où nous nous sommes {mf|rencontrés|rencontrées}. »
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: [Ramasser une arme au sol et tirer sur Cassia] « J'aurais dû vous tuer dès le jour où nous nous sommes {mf|rencontrés|rencontrées}. »

languages.text: [Yerden bir tabanca alıp Cassia'yı vur] "Seninle tanışır tanışmaz canını almalıydım."
languages.original_text: [Pick up a pistol from the floor and shoot Cassia] "I should have killed you as soon as I met you."

traits.locale_text: [Yerden bir tabanca alıp Cassia'yı vur] "Seninle tanışır tanışmaz seni öldürmeliydim."
